swap.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to give something to someone and get something in return

swap.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: to do the thing that someone else has been doing, and let them do the thing that you have been doing
swap.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: They decided to swap roles for the day.
